Module foms
Package foms.management.lists

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
foms.management.lists.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Menu extends Object implements Serializable
The Menu class represents the menu of a branch.

    • isFoodItemInMenu

      public FoodItem isFoodItemInMenu(String foodName)
      Checks if a food item with the given name exists in the menu.
      Parameters:
      foodName - the name of the food item to check for duplicates
      Returns:
      the FoodItem if a duplicate exists, null otherwise

    • displayMenu

      public int displayMenu()
      Asks the person to choose the menu filter type and prints accordingly.
      Returns:
      the input on the latest chosen filter, if needed

    • displayMenu

      Displays the menu based on the specified filter type.
      Parameters:
      filterType - the type of filter to be applied to the menu
